title: When will college reopen
content: I know this question has been asked multiple times but the responses were not that great.need some clarity

comments.body: The responses arent great because KCET hasnt announced a date for their counselling and PES cannot guarantee a date as long as they dont. The best answer u can get is an unreliable estimate that it will reopen between August 5th-12th
Well it was aug 5th on the calendar of events and they havenâ€™t said otherwise so itâ€™s probably still 5th
